statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ -2 \\ 0 \\ -2 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 2 \\ -3 \\ -3 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 5 \\ -6 \\ 6 \\ 4 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -9 \\ 14 \\ -12 \\ -6 \\ -2 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
